item.title: Reply to 'Final Fantasy XII' on /r/GamesTheMovie at https://reddit.com/r/GamesTheMovie/comments/1f8ff1/final_fantasy_xii/:
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Reply to 'Final Fantasy XII' on /r/GamesTheMovie at https://reddit.com/r/GamesTheMovie/comments/1f8ff1/final_fantasy_xii/:

I hope this gets released as a PS2 classic via PSN. I only had 1 play through before my PS2 gave up the ghost.
